feeds.name: patco
feeds.rtServiceAlerts: On March 3rd, PATCO is running a special schedule that is not reflected in RailMe.  Click "View" to view the special schedule.

feeds.name: septa
feeds.alertMessage: Most regional rail lines are now suspended.  All other SEPTA Regoinal Rail trains are expected to have 60+ minute delays.  Visit septa.org for the latest information.

feeds.name: njt
feeds.alertMessage: All NJ Transit train lines are subject to 20 minute delays.  System cross honoring is currently in effect.
